FieldSet.description: Package: CMDB Class that stores information about containers or collections of related software. As a subclass of BMC_Product, this class can be used to represent a package or suite of products. For example, you could represent Microsoft Office as an instance of BMC_Package, whereas Microsoft Word would be an instance of BMC_Product. This class has no corresponding DMTF CIM class.
FieldSet.label: Package
